synopsis.text: Tanabata festivals, delectable cuisine, and breathtaking landscapes come together in this captivating short anime, designed to promote Miyagi prefecture as a must-visit destination for Taiwanese tourists. As part of the 'Wake Up, Miyagi! Fure-Ai Project in Taiwan', this anime not only aims to revitalize the economy after the devastating earthquake and tsunami of 2011 but also showcases the rich culture and local delicacies of the region. Join the characters as they don traditional yukata and explore the vibrant sights of Miyagi, offering a tantalizing glimpse into the unique charm of this beautiful prefecture.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
